name: Salomon Sensibelt Waist Pack - Unisex
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: Keeps water handy for moderately long runs. The soft, moisture-wicking materials reduce sweat buildup and the sway-free bottle holder puts 600ml of hydration right at hand level.Made of stretch materials with no heavy hardware for a comfortable fit.Stretchy zippered main compartment holds a cell phone and other small essentials.Canted bottle holder for quick access.Salomon 3D 600ml bottle included.Reflective details keep you visible after dark.
